TITLE Sweet Potato Tofu Burger

# Cook [1 item sweet potato] peeled, cubed, cooked and mashed
# Drain and press [12 oz extra firm tofu] to remove excess water.
# Crumble tofu with your hands into a bowl. Add in the cooked sweet potato and with a fork mash them together.
# Add [1 cloves garlic [minced]], [1 tsp rosemary [chopped]], [1/4 tsp aleppo].
# Add [salt] & [pepper] to taste.
# Add [1/3 cup oatmeal], ground if desired.
# Mix until well combined. 
# Form into patties. 
# Heat pan over medium heat and add [1 tbl olive oil]. 
# Cook patties for a few minutes on each side until browned. 
# Serve in burger buns or in lettuce wraps. Top with sliced [avocado].
